column5: I bought a Stanley dual console 17 footer. Imagine no more cleaning other than an occasional pressure wash. 100% Canadian made in Parry Sound .I am a pretty pumped Canadian right about now.
There is a dealer here near Ottawa and they look like very well built boats. Congrats on the purchase.
Not a problem wkrp, I had to look too, not a brand I used to see in my area, I may have missed something but with a steering wheel? tiller?
Solid rig. Lifetime purchase for sure. A friend of mine has an 18ft centre console. I love it. Great on the big water too.  S.
now that is a boat built for Georgian Bay! sick!
Beauty!  Love seeing these boats around GBay, tough for sure.  Congrats on the purchase.
